titles.title: John Muir National Historic Site Boundary Adjustment Act
A bill to adjust the boundary of the John Muir National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
John Muir National Historic Site Boundary Adjustment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-704.

bill.summary: John Muir National Historic Site Boundary Adjustment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified land for addition to the John Muir National Historic Site. Adjusts the boundaries of the Historic Site to reflect such acquisition. Requires the Secretary to administer the acquired land as part of the Historic Site.
